title: Revenue Recognition Testing - Q4 2024
description: Testing of revenue recognition controls for Q4 2024 including cut-off procedures and contract review.
criteria: Revenue is recognized when performance obligations are satisfied and control is transferred to the customer.
objective: Ensure revenue recognition complies with ASC 606 and internal policies.

aiFindings.outcome: Selected 25 revenue transactions totaling $2.4M representing 15% of Q4 revenue
All contracts contain clear performance obligations and delivery terms
No exceptions identified in revenue cut-off procedures

comments: Testing completed successfully with no exceptions noted.

title: Access Controls Review - UAR Q4
description: User access review for Q4 2024 including privileged access and segregation of duties testing.
criteria: Users should have appropriate access based on job responsibilities with proper segregation of duties.
objective: Validate that user access is appropriate and properly authorized.

aiFindings.outcome: Identified 3 users with excessive privileges requiring review

comments: Need to follow up on privileged access exceptions with IT team.

title: Change Management Controls
description: Testing of IT change management controls including approval workflows and documentation.
criteria: All IT changes must be properly approved, tested, and documented before implementation.
objective: Ensure change management process is operating effectively.
comments: Initial review complete, need to gather additional evidence for exceptions.

title: Three-Way Match Testing
description: Testing of three-way match controls for purchase orders, receipts, and invoices.
criteria: All purchases must have matching PO, receipt, and invoice before payment approval.
objective: Validate effectiveness of three-way match controls in the procure-to-pay process.

aiFindings.outcome: All exceptions have valid business justification

comments: Testing substantially complete, pending final review.

title: Financial Close Controls
description: Testing of financial close controls including journal entry reviews and account reconciliations.
criteria: All journal entries must be properly approved and account reconciliations completed timely.
objective: Ensure financial close process operates effectively and produces accurate financial statements.

aiFindings.outcome: Initial sample of 30 journal entries selected

comments: Just started - initial sample selection in progress.
